channel.title: Database Technologies on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Database Technologies on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Datastax Logo DataStax, Inc. is a data management company based in Santa Clara, California. Its product provides commercial support, software, and cloud database-as-a-service based on Apache Cassandra. DataStax also provides event streaming support and a cloud service based on Apache Pulsar. As of January 2021, the company has roughly 500 customers distributed in over 50 countries. Source
You can download theDatastaxlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Datastax
item.description: DataStax, Inc. is a data management company based in Santa Clara, California. Its product provides commercial support, software, and cloud database-as-a-service based on Apache Cassandra. DataStax also provides event streaming support and a cloud service based on Apache Pulsar. As of January 2021, the company has roughly 500 customers distributed in over 50 countries. Source
